mapper.sql: a.surgical_consent_id AS "surgicalConsentId", a.id AS "id", a.operation_type AS "operationType", a.witness_time AS "witnessTime", a.witness_locations AS "witnessLocations", a.affected_party AS "affectedParty", a.medical_side AS "medicalSide", a.insured AS "insured", a.policy_no AS "policyNo", a.witness AS "witness", a.record_man AS "recordMan", a.witness_content AS "witnessContent", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM PRE_PERATIVE_CONSENT a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.surgical_consent_id LIKE '%'||#{surgicalConsentId}||'%' '%'+#{surgicalConsentId}+'%' concat('%',#{surgicalConsentId},'%')
AND a.operation_type LIKE '%'||#{operationType}||'%' '%'+#{operationType}+'%' concat('%',#{operationType},'%')
AND a.witness_locations LIKE '%'||#{witnessLocations}||'%' '%'+#{witnessLocations}+'%' concat('%',#{witnessLocations},'%')
AND a.witness LIKE '%'||#{witness}||'%' '%'+#{witness}+'%' concat('%',#{witness},'%')
AND a.record_man LIKE '%'||#{recordMan}||'%' '%'+#{recordMan}+'%' concat('%',#{recordMan},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
